풋살 매치를 예약할 수 있는 사이트입니다. 회원들은 매치를 확인하여 예약: It's a web application that you can book a soccer match. Member users can make reservations or cancel the matches, and admin users can manage matches and members.
CLICK AI는 데이터를 입력하면 인공지능 모델을 자동으로 개발해주는: It's a solution that automatically develops AI models with a click without coding. It is the end-to-end process for AI building, including distribution, analysis/prediction, and a labeling tool related to object recognition.
미세먼지 수치를 측정할 수 있는 서비스입니다. 앱은 위치를 기반으로 미세: It is a service that measures fine dust levels. The app tells you the level of fine dust based on the location, and the web can check the level of fine dust by entering the city you want.
